title: satyamEdi
sahitya:
satyamEdi nityamEdi satyamuga delpumA O satya dEvA


anupallavi

  satyamA mA bhuvi nityamA nIdivi satyamEdO nIvI bhuvini pratyakSamai vivarimpumA


caraNam 1    kalla kapaTamu mA jIvitamu ellalEni mA Ipsitamu alla kallOlamau praLayamu ElakO O satya dEvA
    caraNam 2    andamE mAkAnandamu manda hasita mukhAra vindamu bindugAni muraLIgAnamu andivva mundaDugu vEyumu
